title: How to Spot Tech Stock Winners
description: After the share prices of some of the world's biggest tech stocks slumped in January, how can investors avoid being burned in the future? Which companies will thrive in a new digital era? Financial News' David Ricketts speaks to Virginie Maisonneuve, global CIO for equity at Allianz Global Investors and Stephen Yiu, manager of the £1bn Blue Whale Growth fund.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
